translations: [脊椎] 喷水孔；[无脊椎] 气门；呼吸孔

sentences.sentence: They are in ably silty in build slimy house, open a spiracle in corresponding place only, this.

sentences.sentence: The interior paint is high high-performance hot glue , which may be collocated to the spiracle for air charging test .
